Sentencas: Biomass is one of the encouraging renewable energy sources to mitigate uncertainties in the future energy supply and to address the climate change caused by the increased CO2 emissions.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of sorption enhanced steam biomass gasification with solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Conventionally, thermal energy is produced from biomass via combustion process with low thermodynamic efficiency.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of sorption enhanced steam biomass gasification with solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Conversely, gasification of biomass integrated with innovative power generation technologies, such as Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC), offers much higher conversion efficiency.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of sorption enhanced steam biomass gasification with solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Typically, energy conversion process has multiple conflicting performance criteria, such as capital and operating costs, annual profit, thermodynamic performance and environment impact.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of sorption enhanced steam biomass gasification with solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Multi-objective Optimization (MOO) methods are used to found the optimal compromise in the objective function space, and also to acquire the corresponding optimal values of decision variables.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of sorption enhanced steam biomass gasification with solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: This work investigates integration and optimization of a Sorption Enhanced Steam Biomass Gasification (SEG) with a SOFC and Gas Turbine (GT) system for the production of power and heat from Eucalyptus wood chips.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of sorption enhanced steam biomass gasification with solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The energy system model is firstly developed in Aspen Plus simulator, which has five main units: (1) SEG coupled with calcium looping for hydrogen-rich gas production, (2) hot gas cleaning and steam reforming, (3) SOFC-GT for converting hydrogen into electricity, (4) catalytic burning and CO2 compression, and (5) cement production from the purge CaO stream of SEG unit.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of sorption enhanced steam biomass gasification with solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Then, the design and operating variables of the conversion system are optimized for annual profit, annualized total capital cost, operating cost and exergy efficiency, using MOO.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of sorption enhanced steam biomass gasification with solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Finally, for the implementation purpose, two selection methods and parametric uncertainty analysis are performed to identify good solutions from the Pareto-optimal front.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of sorption enhanced steam biomass gasification with solid oxide fuel cell
